title: What is OpenCore Computer? (Illegal Hackintosh Vendor?) - Krazy Ken's Tech Talk
tags: What is OpenCore Computer? (Illegal Hackintosh Vendor?) - Krazy Ken's Tech Talk
description: What is OpenCore Computer? In short, they sell commercial Hackintoshes, which falls into an area of questionable legality. Psystar did something like this, too, before Apple shut them down. Today, we'll talk about this new "company" and we'll time-travel back to Apple's official Macintosh clone program.  Join our channel and get cool stuff!   Watch more knock-off / scam episodes   Subscribe for more tech videos!    Follow us on Twitter   Like us on Facebook    Krazy Ken's Tech Talk - What is OpenCore Computer? (Illegal Hackintosh Vendor?)  Pledge on Patreon now to get your name in the show credits and gain access to Krazy Ken's VIP Discord channel!*   Special thanks to Steve from Mac84 for helping out! He's working on a more in-depth "Mac clones" video, plus he covers many other tech topics, so please check him out!   Did you see that pretty PC b-roll? Those are from Snazzy Labs and Gear Seekers. Check them out! Snazzy Labs   Gear Seekers    Thanks, Alkanea, for assisting!   Additional archival footage is from Computer Chronicles.  Contact Us    Want music for your videos?   (We use these guys a lot. They're good.)  Get film gear Ken uses   On a lower budget?    Amazon links are powered by the Amazon Associates Program. *not all Patreon tiers qualify for all rewards #KrazyKen #ComputerClan
